title: Commoner White Mage - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Ecchi   Fantasy   Mystery   Psychological   Romance   School Life   Seinen   Supernatural   Tragedy
tags: Academy   Battle Academy   Beautiful Female Lead   Bloodlines   Bookworm   Calm Protagonist   Demons   Different Social Status   European Ambience   Fairies   Female Master   Golems   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hated Protagonist   Kingdoms   Lack of Common Sense   Magic   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Mythical Beasts   Nobles   Spirits   Unrequited Love   Wars   Weak to Strong   Wizards
author: Ramunabe   らむなべ
description:
Wizard.

It is a transcendent who uses magic to fight, protect, and save. However, in the world of wizards, talent speaks for itself. The long history of magic has picked up only talented clans, and now the only wizards are aristocrats. That is common sense here in Manalil.

At the Beralt Magic Academy, one of Manalil’s leading educational institutions, the eggs of excellent wizards are gathering again this year.

Yes, except for one person. 

A simple boy who gets a lot of looks. A country bumpkin who has nothing to do with the glittering world. There was the only commoner at the academy.

“I want to be a mage.” 

The story of a peasant who wants to be a mage and fulfil his dream is about to begin.>
